level.heading: Applicability of Rental Housing Act of 1985.
level.text: For purposes of this chapter, the provisions of § 42-3505.01(n) shall apply.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 14-213 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: "The Mayor may issue rules to implement the Abatement and Condemnation of Nuisance Properties Omnibus Amendment Act of 2000 in accordance with the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act."
